title: How to Overcome Your Anxiety Ft. David Marvin
description:
Anxiety is on the rise, and we are here today with David Marvin to talk about how to find freedom from our anxiety.


Want to send Jeanine a message?  You can do that here: https://anchor.fm/happyandhealthy by clicking "Message."

Support our podcast!  Visit: https://anchor.fm/happyandhealthy and click "Support!"


Better Help:

Use code HEALTHY for 10% of your first month at Better Help: https://betterhelp.com/healthy. Thanks, Better Help for sponsoring today's episode.

Follow us on Instagram!

Happy and Healthy: https://www.instagram.com/HappyandHealthyPodcast/

Jeanine: https://www.instagram.com/jeanineamapola/

David: https://www.instagram.com/davidjmarvin/


Follow us on TikTok!

Happy and Healthy: https://vm.tiktok.com/ZMRktmycQ/

Jeanine: https://vm.tiktok.com/ZMRktnchb/


You can WATCH this episode here: https://youtu.be/L-uIAQkA8kc

You can also listen to the audio form on Spotify, Apple Podcast, Google Podcast, Overcast, Anchor, Breaker, Pocket Casts, and Radio Public.
